item.description:
When:
Wednesday, July 11, 2007, 6:30 PM 20070627T223000Z
Where: For Mapquest, GPS and others use:
Elizabeth Park Lawn Area
apx 1550 Asylum Ave
Hartford/West Hartford , CT

Look at your maps first for best routes..

From 84: take exit #48 get onto Asylum ave and head towards West Hartford...

go about 1.7 miles to Prospect St, you can enter the park here by taking a left then a right into the drive way (this puts you right by the lawn..it might fill up first)or just go a bit further on Asylum and enter on the left..and park in the big parking lot or for that matter anything thats left open...

Info/Map
Description:
Free Concert in Elizabeth Park, Hartford. The roses are in bloom.

Ok i will bring my little grille this time..i got so much junk in the car trunk, i sometimes forget to laod it..
Maybe Polish sausage... Ethnick dining at its best...bring a fork or eat it savage style...by hand or on the end of a stick...LOL

I have no idea what music they play..Beatles ???, who are they anyway..sound like some creatures....but it dosent really matter..its going to be a good outside time.. if it dosent rain....
if they play inside again..im still stayoing outside......
There is still abottle of wino juice stuff left over from the dinner....ist getting packed for this too...

Bring your blanket, lawn chairs, wine, and snacks.

I will do what i can to get there early to reserve a space on the lawn. (i will throw down a few blankets..for to keep those pesky others from stealing your space...)and put my 2 ORANGE TRAFFIC CONES at the ends.....that should make it easier to find us..


Best chance for Parking: Use Asylum Ave. entrance. Go into park past the Pond House (on your left), the parking lot is on your RIGHT across from the concert stage. Get there early for a parking space!!!

It will be cancelled if it's raining.
Rain back up plan: none this time


For a map of the park, go to www.elizabethpark.org

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Outdoor Concert at Elizabeth Park, Beatles Tribute.No Not MY Bugs.I let them go
